modelingAssessmentEditor.assessmentLockedCurrentUser: You have the lock for this assessment

messages.lock: You do now have the lock on this submission. Only you can assess this model. Please assess this model before opening other submissions.
messages.noModel: No model could be found for this submission.
messages.submitFailedWithConflict: Submission failed! Conflict with existing Assessments detected
messages.resultDismissed: Your assessment was dismissed because another tutor already rated this model.
messages.confirmSubmission: Are you sure you want to submit this assessment? You will not be able to change it afterwards.
messages.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel the assessment? Your current assessment progress will be deleted and the submission will be available for assessment to other tutors again.
